title: Game crashes after champ selection
body: as the title says my game crashes after champ select. Ive tried changing stuff in the files, reinstalling it, repairing it and nothin works.. makes me kinda sad since i havent played it that much

replies.body: Since rito refuses to help it's players ill be kind enough to tell you if u updated to the most recent version of windows 10 u need to enter your new xbox app and disable dvr. its tedious but its the only solution.

Seriously, 

There are 10 million monthly players. Even if Riot wanted to hire trouble shooters and customer service agents, they couldn't possibly hire enough to adequately support that size of a player base.

They do what they can... See above.
Fixing their client is what they should have done...since they didnt do that they could have at least made a sticky on a forum...they didnt even do that...it takes one person to offer that support.

Point taken, they can't do anything right and only make bad decisions.

Glad I learned that.
so making a simple statement regarding the issue is too difficult...gotcha...
